original: Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo
Nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavañca
nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Noāsavañca nanoāsavañca
dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ca nanoāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
